trans-unit.source: Represents a set of data commands and a database connection that are used to fill the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and update a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conjunto de comandos de dados e uma ligação de base de dados que são utilizados para preencher o <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> e atualizar uma base de dados do SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataAdapter, serves as a bridge between a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> and SQL Server for retrieving and saving data.
trans-unit.target: SqlDataAdapter, funciona como uma ponte entre um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>e o SQL Server para obter e os dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataAdapter provides this bridge by mapping <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>, which changes the data in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to match the data in the data source, and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, using the appropriate Transact-SQL statements against the data source.
trans-unit.target: O SqlDataAdapter fornece este bridge ao mapeamento <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>, que altera os dados a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>para fazer corresponder dados na origem de dados, e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, que altera os dados da origem de dados para fazer corresponder dados no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, utilizando as instruções Transact-SQL adequadas contra a origem de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The update is performed on a by-row basis.
trans-unit.target: A atualização é executada numa base por linha.

trans-unit.source: For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (`Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete`).
trans-unit.target: Para cada linha inserida, modificação e eliminada o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>método determina o tipo de alteração que efetuou na mesma (`Insert`, `Update`, ou `Delete`).</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo do tipo de alteração, o `Insert`, `Update`, ou `Delete` modelo comando executa para propagar a linha modificada para a origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: When the SqlDataAdapter fills a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, it creates the necessary tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Quando o SqlDataAdapter preenche um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, cria as tabelas necessárias e colunas para os dados devolvidos se estes ainda não existir.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, informações da chave primária não estão incluídas no esquema implicitamente criado, a menos que a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>.</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may also have the SqlDataAdapter create the schema of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, including primary key information, before filling it with data using `FillSchema`.
trans-unit.target: Também poderá ter SqlDataAdapter criar o esquema do <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, incluindo informações da chave primária, antes de preenchê-lo com a utilização de dados `FillSchema`.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [adicionar restrições existente para um conjunto de dados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: SqlDataAdapter is used in conjunction with <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> to increase performance when connecting to a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: SqlDataAdapter é utilizado em conjunto com <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>para aumentar o desempenho ao ligar a uma base de dados do SQL Server.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using SQL Server stored procedures to edit or delete data using a `DataAdapter`, make sure that you do not use SET NOCOUNT ON in the stored procedure definition.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se estiver a utilizar procedimentos armazenados do SQL Server para editar ou eliminar dados utilizando um `DataAdapter`, certifique-se de que não utilize SET NOCOUNT ON na definição do procedimento armazenado.

trans-unit.source: This causes the rows affected count returned to be zero, which the `DataAdapter` interprets as a concurrency conflict.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que a contagem de afetado pelas linhas devolvida ser zero, o qual o `DataAdapter` interpreta como um conflito de concorrência.

trans-unit.source: In this event, a <xref:System.Data.DBConcurrencyException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, um <xref:System.Data.DBConcurrencyException>será emitida.</xref:System.Data.DBConcurrencyException>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataAdapter also includes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.TableMappings%2A> properties to facilitate the loading and updating of data.
trans-unit.target: O SqlDataAdapter também inclui o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.TableMappings%2A>Propriedades para facilitar o carregamento e a atualização de dados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.TableMappings%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of SqlDataAdapter is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando é criada uma instância de SqlDataAdapter, as propriedades de leitura/escrita são definidas para valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the SqlDataAdapter constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista destes valores, consulte o construtor de SqlDataAdapter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> are generic templates that are automatically filled with individual values from every modified row through the parameters mechanism.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>genérico modelos que são automaticamente preenchida com valores individuais de cada linha modificada através do mecanismo de parâmetros.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For every column that you propagate to the data source on <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`.
trans-unit.target: Para cada coluna que propagam à origem de dados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, deve ser adicionado um parâmetro para o `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, ou `DeleteCommand`.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.SourceColumn%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> object should be set to the name of the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.SourceColumn%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>objecto deve ser definido como o nome da coluna.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.SourceColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row.
trans-unit.target: Esta definição indica que o valor do parâmetro não está definido manualmente, mas é obtido a partir da coluna específica na linha atualmente processada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will occur if the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method is called and the table contains a user-defined type that is not available on the client computer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>ocorrerá se o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>método for chamado e a tabela contém um tipo definido pelo utilizador que não está disponível no computador cliente.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Creating and Using User-Defined Types](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139492) in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [criar e tipos de Using User-Defined](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139492) no SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>é criada, as seguintes propriedades forem definidas para os seguintes valores iniciais de leitura/escrita.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>|`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>|`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedades | Valor inicial | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>| `MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>| `MissingSchemaAction.Add`| Pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> as the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> como o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> constructor sets the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>conjuntos de construtor de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade para o valor especificado no `selectCommand` parâmetro.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>é criada, as seguintes propriedades forem definidas para os seguintes valores iniciais de leitura/escrita.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>|`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>|`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedades | Valor inicial | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>| `MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>| `MissingSchemaAction.Add`| Pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> (or any of the other command properties) is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>(ou qualquer uma das outras propriedades de comandos) está atribuído para um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>mantém uma referência a criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure and is set as the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> que é um procedimento armazenado ou uma instrução Transact-SQL SELECT e é definido como o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> class with a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> and a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> classe com um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>e um <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> opens and closes a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> if it is not already open.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>abre e fecha um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>se ainda não estiver aberto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: This can be useful in an application that must call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method for two or more <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> objects.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ser útil numa aplicação que tem de chamar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>método para dois ou mais <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>objetos.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is already open, you must explicitly call **Close** or **Dispose** to close it.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>é já aberto, deve chamar explicitamente **fechar** ou **eliminar** para fechar o mesmo.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>é criada, as seguintes propriedades forem definidas para os seguintes valores iniciais de leitura/escrita.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>|`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>|`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| You can change the value of either of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedades | Valor inicial | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>| `MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>| `MissingSchemaAction.Add`| Pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que é uma instrução Transact-SQL SELECT ou o procedimento armazenado para ser utilizado pelo <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> that represents the connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> que representa a ligação.

trans-unit.source: If your connection string does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>, you can use <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> to pass the user ID and password more securely than by specifying the user ID and password as text in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Se não utilizar a cadeia de ligação <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref>, pode utilizar <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> para passar o ID de utilizador e palavra-passe de forma mais segura do que ao especificar o ID de utilizador e palavra-passe como texto na cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> class with a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> and a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> classe com um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>e uma cadeia de ligação.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> constructor uses the `selectCommandText` parameter to set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>construtor utiliza o `selectCommandText` parâmetro para definir o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> will create and maintain the connection created with the `selectConnectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>irá criar e manter a ligação criada com o `selectConnectionString` parâmetro.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>é criada, as seguintes propriedades forem definidas para os seguintes valores iniciais de leitura/escrita.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>|`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>|`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedades | Valor inicial | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>| `MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>| `MissingSchemaAction.Add`| Pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que é uma instrução Transact-SQL SELECT ou o procedimento armazenado para ser utilizado pelo <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.source: If your connection string does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>, you can use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.%23ctor%2A> and <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> to pass the user ID and password more securely than by specifying the user ID and password as text in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Se não utilizar a cadeia de ligação <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref>, pode utilizar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.%23ctor%2A> e <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> para passar o ID de utilizador e palavra-passe de forma mais segura do que ao especificar o ID de utilizador e palavra-passe como texto na cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to delete records from the data set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instrução Transact-SQL ou o procedimento armazenado para eliminar registos de conjunto de dados.

trans-unit.source: During <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, the DeleteCommand can be generated automatically if you set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property and use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Durante a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, se esta propriedade não está definida e informações da chave primária estão presentes na <xref:System.Data.DataSet>DeleteCommand pode ser gerada automaticamente se definir a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade e utilize <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, os comandos adicionais que o se não tiver definido foram gerados por <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Esta lógica geração necessita de informações de coluna chave estar presente no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When DeleteCommand is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando DeleteCommand é atribuído a um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: The DeleteCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: DeleteCommand mantém uma referência a criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: For every column that you propagate to the data source on <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`.
trans-unit.target: Para cada coluna que propagam à origem de dados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, deve ser adicionado um parâmetro para o `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, ou `DeleteCommand`.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column.
trans-unit.target: O `SourceColumn` propriedade do parâmetro deve ser definida para o nome da coluna.

trans-unit.source: This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row.
trans-unit.target: Isto indica que o valor do parâmetro não está definido manualmente, mas é obtido a partir da coluna específica na linha atualmente processada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> used during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> to delete records in the database that correspond to deleted rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> utilizada durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>Eliminar registos na base de dados que correspondem a eliminar linhas no <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to insert new records into the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instrução Transact-SQL ou o procedimento armazenado para inserir novos registos na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: During <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, the InsertCommand can be generated automatically if you set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property and use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Durante a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, se esta propriedade não está definida e informações da chave primária estão presentes na <xref:System.Data.DataSet>InsertCommand pode ser gerado automaticamente se definir a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade e utilize <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, os comandos adicionais que o se não tiver definido foram gerados por <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Esta lógica geração necessita de informações de coluna chave estar presente no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When InsertCommand is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando é atribuído InsertCommand para um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: The InsertCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: O InsertCommand mantém uma referência a criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: If execution of this command returns rows, these rows can be added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending on how you set the **UpdatedRowSource** property of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: Se a execução deste comando devolve as linhas, estas linhas podem ser adicionadas ao <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, dependendo de como definir o **UpdatedRowSource** propriedade o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For every column that you propagate to the data source on <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, a parameter should be added to `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`.
trans-unit.target: Para cada coluna que propagam à origem de dados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, um parâmetro deve ser adicionado à `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, ou `DeleteCommand`.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column.
trans-unit.target: O `SourceColumn` propriedade do parâmetro deve ser definida para o nome da coluna.

trans-unit.source: This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row.
trans-unit.target: Isto indica que o valor do parâmetro não está definido manualmente, mas é obtido a partir da coluna específica na linha atualmente processada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> used during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> to insert records into the database that correspond to new rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> utilizada durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>ao inserir registos na base de dados que correspondem às novas linhas no <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> after a command is executed against the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>depois de um comando é executado contra a origem de dados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The attempt to update is made, so the event fires.
trans-unit.target: A tentativa de atualização é efetuada para que o evento é acionado.

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, existem dois eventos que ocorrem por linha de dados atualizada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de execução é o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores existentes no <xref:System.Data.DataRow>são movidas para os valores de parâmetros.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: Executa o comando.

trans-unit.source: If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se o comando está definido como `FirstReturnedRecord`, o primeiro devolveu o resultado é colocado na <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se existirem parâmetros de saída, estes são colocados em <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> before a command is executed against the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>antes de ser executado um comando contra a origem de dados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The attempt to update is made, so the event fires.
trans-unit.target: A tentativa de atualização é efetuada para que o evento é acionado.

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, existem dois eventos que ocorrem por linha de dados atualizada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de execução é o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores existentes no <xref:System.Data.DataRow>são movidas para os valores de parâmetros.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: Executa o comando.

trans-unit.source: If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se o comando está definido como `FirstReturnedRecord`, o primeiro devolveu o resultado é colocado na <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se existirem parâmetros de saída, estes são colocados em <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure used to select records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instrução Transact-SQL ou o procedimento armazenado utilizado para selecionar registos na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: When SelectCommand is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando é atribuído SelectCommand para um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: The SelectCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: SelectCommand mantém uma referência a criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the SelectCommand does not return any rows, no tables are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and no exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se SelectCommand não devolver quaisquer linhas, não existem tabelas são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, e não a exceção é acionada.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> used during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill*> to select records from the database for placement in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> utilizada durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill*>para selecionar registos da base de dados para o posicionamento no <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill*>

trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter>interface.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> que é utilizada durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>para selecionar registos a partir da origem de dados para o posicionamento no conjunto de dados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição deste membro, consulte <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*>.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.IdbCommand> that is used during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> to update records in the data source for modified rows in the data set.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Data.IdbCommand>que é utilizada durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>para atualizar os registos da origem de dados para linhas modificadas no conjunto de dados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> </xref:System.Data.IdbCommand>

trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição deste membro, consulte <xref:System.ICloneable.Clone*>.</xref:System.ICloneable.Clone*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.ICloneable>interface.</xref:System.ICloneable> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto que é uma cópia da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows that are processed in each round-trip to the server.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de linhas que são processados em cada round-trip para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables batch processing support, and specifies the number of commands that can be executed in a batch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que ativa ou desativa o suporte de processamento em lote e especifica o número de comandos que podem ser executadas num batch.

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateBatchSize property to update a data source with changes from a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de UpdateBatchSize para atualizar uma origem de dados com alterações de <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: This can increase application performance by reducing the number of round-trips to the server.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode aumentar o desempenho da aplicação, reduzindo o número de ida e volta ao servidor.

trans-unit.source: Executing an extremely large batch could decrease performance.
trans-unit.target: Executar um lote extremamente grande pode diminuir o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should test for the optimum batch size setting before implementing your application.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, deverá testar para a definição de tamanho de lote ideal antes de implementar a aplicação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown if the value is set to a number less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>é emitida se o valor estiver definido como um número inferior a zero.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to process per-batch.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas a processar por lote.

trans-unit.source: Value is
trans-unit.target: O valor é

trans-unit.source: Effect
trans-unit.target: Efeito

trans-unit.source: There is no limit on the batch size..
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum limite no tamanho de lote...

trans-unit.source: Disables batch updating.
trans-unit.target: Desativa a atualização do batch.

trans-unit.source: >1
trans-unit.target: >1

trans-unit.source: Changes are sent using batches of UpdateBatchSize operations at a time.
trans-unit.target: As alterações são enviadas através de lotes de UpdateBatchSize operações de cada vez.

trans-unit.source: When setting this to a value other than 1, all the commands associated with the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> have to have their **UpdatedRowSource** property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputParameters" name="OutputParameters" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta opção para um valor diferente de 1, todos os comandos associado a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> tem de ter os respetivos **UpdatedRowSource** propriedade definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputParameters" name="OutputParameters" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown otherwise.
trans-unit.target: É emitida uma exceção, caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure used to update records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instrução Transact-SQL ou o procedimento armazenado utilizado para atualizar os registos da origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: During <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, the UpdateCommand can be generated automatically if you set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property and use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Durante a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, se esta propriedade não está definida e informações da chave primária estão presentes na <xref:System.Data.DataSet>UpdateCommand pode ser gerada automaticamente se definir a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade e utilize <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, os comandos adicionais que o se não tiver definido foram gerados por <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Esta lógica geração necessita de informações de coluna chave estar presente no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When UpdateCommand is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando UpdateCommand é atribuído a um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: UpdateCommand mantém uma referência a criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If execution of this command returns rows, the updated rows may be merged with the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending on how you set the **UpdatedRowSource** property of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se a execução deste comando devolve as linhas, as linhas atualizadas podem ser intercaladas com o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, dependendo de como definir o **UpdatedRowSource** propriedade o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For every column that you propagate to the data source on <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, a parameter should be added to `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`.
trans-unit.target: Para cada coluna que propagam à origem de dados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, um parâmetro deve ser adicionado à `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, ou `DeleteCommand`.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column.
trans-unit.target: O `SourceColumn` propriedade do parâmetro deve ser definida para o nome da coluna.

trans-unit.source: This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but taken from the particular column in the currently processed row.
trans-unit.target: Isto indica que o valor do parâmetro não é definir manualmente, mas obtido a partir da coluna específica na linha atualmente processada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> used during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> to update records in the database that correspond to modified rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> utilizada durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>atualizar os registos na base de dados que correspondam à modificado linhas o <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>
